The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, they do not realize that what was found is much more than they ever anticipated and what started out as research immediately turned nightmarish. So much so that they went into survival mode to make it out alive.
The movie originated with co-producers Philip P. Lover 3rd and Macke Novello Swanepo
